userPrompt:
Write Chapter {{chapterNumber}}: "{{chapterTitle}}".
{{#outline}}<story_outline>{{outline}}</story_outline>{{/outline}}

<audience_guidance>{{audienceGuidance}}</audience_guidance>
<voice_guidance>{{voiceGuidance}}</voice_guidance>
<pacing_guidance>{{pacingGuidance}}</pacing_guidance>
<length_guidance>{{lengthGuidance}}</length_guidance>

<characters>
Use every character as listed (names, roles, types, ages, traits, characteristics, physical descriptions). Keep continuity; do not invent new attributes.
{{characters}}
</characters>

<chapter_requirements>
- Maintain consistency with previous chapters and the overall story
- Use vivid descriptions and engaging dialogue
- Show character development and interactions
- Include action and emotional moments appropriate for the target audience
- End with a natural transition to the next chapter
</chapter_requirements>

<chapter_output_schema>
Provide both a short summary and the full prose:
Summary: 2-4 sentences covering key beats and emotions.
Body:
[Write the full chapter prose here]
</chapter_output_schema>

templateVariables.lengthGuidance: Length and paragraph guidance for this audience
templateVariables.characters: Formatted character roster with full metadata
